title: AstraZeneca's Calquence steps up to challenge Imbruvica with big CLL green light
author: Carly Helfand; Angus Liu
description: Johnson & Johnson and AbbVie's Imbruvica has enjoyed a nice run in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia over the last few years. | Johnson & Johnson and AbbVie's Imbruvica has enjoyed a nice run in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia over the last few years. But major competition is here in the form of AstraZeneca's Calquence. Thursday, the FDA—along with regulators in Canada and Australia—green-lighted Calquence in newly diagnosed CLL or small lymphocytic lymphoma.
